name: 斯瓦姆·维查尔
name_full: 斯瓦姆·维查尔 Shivam Vichare
introduction: He went to Lilavatibai Podar High school in Mumbai and graduated from Smt. M.M.K College in Mass Media, majoring in advertising. His career began at an early age of 7 when he acted in an Academy Award nominated film After The Wedding directed by Susanne Bier and starring Mads Mikkelsen. He also acted in The Whisperers directed by Rajeev Virani. He has an affinity towards advertising and has won several awards at inter-school and inter-collegiate levels. However, as he grew up he found himself getting inclined towards direction and assisted Sohail Tattari on a feature, Tennis Buddies. He has also written and directed a short film which is available on YouTube.
